description: This table maps driver streak type IDs to their respective name (based on https://github.com/samsara-dev/backend/blob/master/go/src/samsaradev.io/safety/driverstreaks/driverstreaksproto/driver_streak.proto)

schema.name: driver_streak_type_id
schema.description: The id of the driver streak type.

schema.name: driver_streak_type
schema.description: The name of the driver streak type.
